ExperimentTitle:
Experiment No. 8 - Offhand Grinding

Weld Edge Preparation
Steps:
Step 1

Check the size of MS plate with respect to- 150 x 50 x 10 mm.

Step 2

Take the workpiece and do the marking as per required bevel dimension. For marking use steel scale and scriber..

Step 3

Grab the Center Punch & Hammer & make impressions points on the line.

Step 5

Attach the welded plates to the Mechanical vise & do the grinding with the hand grinder as per the marking.
